definition: The term "tragbar" refers to an object or device that can be easily carried or transported from one place to another. It is commonly used to describe portable items that are convenient to move around due to their lightweight or compact nature.

examples.german: Das tragbare Gerät ist leicht zu transportieren.
examples.english: The portable device is easy to carry.

examples.german: Die tragbare Musikbox hat einen guten Klang.
examples.english: The portable music box has a good sound.

examples.german: Die tragbare Lampe leuchtet den Raum gut aus.
examples.english: The portable lamp illuminates the room well.

examples.german: Die tragbare Klimaanlage kühlt den Raum schnell ab.
examples.english: The portable air conditioner cools the room quickly.

examples.german: Die tragbare Powerbank lädt das Handy unterwegs auf.
examples.english: The portable power bank charges the phone on the go.
